comprehensive_overview: nghttp2 is an open-source implementation of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol version 2 (HTTP/2) and its header compression algorithm. The project also include a HTTP/2 server, client, and proxy.
core_features: 1. Implementation of HTTP/2 protocol. 2. Optimized header compression algorithm. 3. Provides HTTP/2 server, client, and proxy. 4. Open-source and actively maintained.
